pros: Everything I can think of. Good people. Great values.
cons: Location. Nothing I can think of.

job_title: Learning Support Worker in Cranleigh, England
pros: People are very nice and helpful, always ready to help when someone is in doubt or anxious.
cons: Staff turnover is very bad which makes it difficult for management to be organised properly. The lack of staff made the remaining staff want to leave.

pros: I had a great experience at Jigsaw - you get to work with some amazing children and young people, the staff are lovely, and the role is very rewarding
cons: I can't think of any cons - if I had to say one thing then it would be that the pay is on the lower side but this is the same as general pay for the field

job_title: Learning Support Worker in Dunsfold, England
pros:
- Made a difference to people's lives everyday which was really enjoyable
- Friendly environment 
- Lots of opportunity to develop your skills further and to train at different levels
- Lots of activities for the learners to take part in
cons:
- It felt like sometimes specific learners were able to do more tasks than others 
- Sometimes Management didn't listen to you if you were upset about something

job_title: Special Education Teacher in Guildford, England
pros: The most supportive and motivational employer I have ever had. The quality of the professional development opportunities within the trust is amazing and encouraged by all staff. Many bonuses and benefits to working within the trust and respect of the management and governors. The job itself is empowering, reflective and inspirational. The whole experience is positive.
cons: The outside perspective of people who are not well informed about ABA and CABAS and insist on making assumptions about the work we do.

pros: The school itself is a wonderful place and the kids really enjoy their time.
cons: Pay is very low for what teaching staff have to deal with, compared to pay of those in office based roles. Teaching staff have take work home due to being understaffed and no time in day to do it.
Small space for too many children

job_title: SEN Teaching Assistant in Guildford, England
pros: valuable insight into working with SEN children
